questions: An iron nail wound up with wire which is carrying current is suspended freely. In which direction will it rest?

option3: The magnetic needle becomes red hot

questions: A wooden block is wound by conducting wires and the current is switched on and attracts the iron pins with little strength. Choose the correct options.
option1: Wooden block does not have electromagnetic effects.
option2: Only wire shows some electromagnetic properties.
option3: Wooden block must be broken and hence does not get electromagnetic properties.

questions: Gappu cycled a distance of 5 km in 60 minutes. What is her cycling speed?

option4: Both cars have the same speed
